QuestData.Title: Oronu the Elder
QuestData.Description: According to the tablets, an artifact known as a Medallion of Karabor was kept at Baa'ri. Only the highest-ranking draenei priests were granted these, as they allowed unfettered access into the Temple of Karabor.$B$BWe must find out whether the Ashtongue have recovered the medallion that was kept at Baa'ri yet. Its power would provide great aid in our fight against Illidan.$B$BAkama's lieutenant at Baa'ri, Oronu the Elder, receives written orders from him daily. Obtain them and bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Arcanist Thelis at the Sanctum of the Stars wants you to obtain the Orders from Akama from Oronu the Elder at the Ruins of Baa'ri.$B$BCompleting quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Any news yet, $n? Time is not on our side.
QuestData.RewardText: It matches Akama's handwriting... let us see what we can learn.
